EIANN_utils module

EIANN_utils Module

Functions

get_diag_argmax_row_indexes(data)

Sort the rows of a square matrix such that whenever row argmax and col argmax are equal, that value appears on the diagonal.

n_choose_k(n, k)

Calculates number of ways to choose k things out of n, using binomial coefficients

n_hot_patterns(n, length)

Generates all possible binary n-hot patterns of given length

test_EIANN_config(network, dataset, target, …)
